avzConfigure.avzDir.description: Path to root directory of AvZ.
avzConfigure.compileOptions.description: Additional compilation options used by AvZ for compiling scripts.
avzConfigure.avzRunScriptCmd.description:
Command to run AvZ scripts.
When generating the command, "__FILE_NAME__" will be replaced by path to the script file, "__AVZ_DIR__" will be replaced by path to root directory of AvZ, "___COMPILER_CMD__" will be replaced by [AvZ Script Compile Command].
avzConfigure.downloadSource.description: Download channel of AvZ and AvZ extensions.
